title: got a ward skin in a box but i dont actually have it
body: no proof but i got an icy ward skin and it said it was in my inventory but i dont have it

replies.body: Maybe try logging out and than back in?

Hey! 

If you shoot Player Support [a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they'll be able to take a look at your inventory and make any necessary adjustments. :)
its weird like i probably wouldnt use the ward skin buts its strange that its just gone
